P-WC Class Series (OVAL)
ROAD

races at 0:45 GMT qual at 0:30 GMT (race week 1 at 1:45 GMT)

(Afternoon)

course cautions, Lucky dog, Double
file restarts lapped at back.

file restarts lapped at back.

course cautions, Lucky dog, Double
